title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-5.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-5.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The rules contained in this Subpart have been promulgated to provide protection for persons served by nonpublic water supplies, and to conform to the requirements of the County Law and the Town Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
